name: Tameme - Defense
description:
In this game you care about this rounded little creature called tame, your goal is to defend TameCity from the enemies. 

This creature has behavioral aspects that define Tame's  emotions, happiness will drive his emotions depending on how well cared he/she  is in other aspects as Sleep, Hunger and Health.

 The goal is to make it survive  making him go to sleep, feeding him playing defending the city and petting him., when you're defending the coins will increase. This will allow you to buy upgrades on the future, Still in really early access stage.

Do not let him die, it is your time to stack up on money, arrows are free!!

Features
  • Has Day/Night cycle with a  sleep feature  *Recently added
  • A clock that tells the actual time + Survival Panel, with hours and days alive as a High score.  *Recently added
  • A coin's feature by now used as well as a high score *Recently added

Work in progress content Shopping feature *WIP Arrows Counter *WIP City citizens Counter *WP Enemy/Rounds mission *WIP
